hero.title: Expert Marketing Solutions for Humanitarian Organizations
hero.description: We create impactful marketing campaigns that build trust and lasting relationships.

intro.title: Your Trusted Marketing Agency in Ontario & British Colombia
intro.description: We are a dedicated marketing agency specializing in face-to-face marketing and brand awareness for humanitarian organizations, charities, and the medical community, backed by over 25 years of collective experience.

about.title: About Us
about.description: We are a results-driven agency helping brands grow with innovative marketing strategies and meaningful customer engagement.
about.pageDescription: Clearpaths is a results-driven marketing agency specializing in face-to-face marketing and brand awareness for humanitarian organizations, charities, and the medical community. With over 25 years of collective experience, our team is dedicated to helping brands grow through innovative strategies and meaningful customer engagement.
about.missionText: To connect brands with people by creating impactful marketing campaigns that build trust and lasting relationships. We believe in the power of authentic engagement and strive to make a positive difference in the humanitarian and medical sectors.

whyPoints.text: Specialized in humanitarian and medical marketing
Proven track record of successful campaigns

services.title: Our Services
services.description: Expert marketing solutions for humanitarian organizations and the medical community, enhancing brand visibility and engagement.

items.title: Face-to-Face Marketing
items.description: Engaging strategies that connect brands directly with audiences, fostering meaningful interactions and relationships.

items.title: Brand Awareness
items.description: Strategic campaigns designed to increase brand visibility and recognition among your target audience.

items.title: Community Engagement
items.description: Building meaningful connections with your community through authentic and impactful marketing initiatives.

items.title: Digital Marketing
items.description: Comprehensive digital solutions including social media, content marketing, and online advertising to expand your reach.

careers.title: Careers at Clearpaths
careers.description: Join our passionate team and help make a difference in the humanitarian and medical marketing sectors. Explore our current openings or reach out to us directly!

openings.title: wMarketing Coordinator
openings.description: Coordinate and support marketing campaigns, events, and outreach for our clients. Experience in the humanitarian or medical sector is a plus.

openings.title: Field Representative
openings.description: Engage directly with communities and represent our clients in face-to-face marketing initiatives. Strong communication skills required.

contact.leftDescription: Contact Clearpaths for marketing solutions in humanitarian and medical sectors. We're here to help!

items.question: What services does Clearpaths offer?
items.answer: We provide marketing solutions for humanitarian and medical sectors, including face-to-face marketing, brand awareness campaigns, and client relationship management.

items.question: How can I contact your team?
items.answer: You can reach us via the contact form on our Contact page, or email us at Contact@Clearpaths.com or Recruitment@Clearpaths.com.

items.question: Where are your offices located?
items.answer: We have offices in Mississauga, Ontario and Surrey, British Columbia. See our Contact page for addresses and maps.

items.question: What are your business hours?
items.answer: Our offices are open from 10 AM to 4 PM, Monday to Friday.

items.question: Do you work with organizations outside Canada?
items.answer: Yes, we are open to collaborating with international organizations. Please contact us to discuss your needs.
